intro: Barleria aenea, commonly known as silverleaf barleria, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a herbaceous perennial that typically grows to a height of about 30 to 60 centimeters. The plant features narrow, silver-green leaves that are often covered in fine hairs, giving it a distinctive appearance. Its small, tubular flowers are usually pink or purple and bloom in clusters during the warmer months. Barleria aenea is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments, making it a hardy plant suitable for xeriscaping.
